Package game.movement

Class FollowBehaviour

java.lang.Object
game.movement.FindBehaviour
All Implemented Interfaces:
Behaviour
Direct Known Subclasses:
FollowFoodOnGroundBehaviour, FollowFoodOnPlantBehaviour, FollowMateBehaviour, FollowVictimBehaviour
public abstract class FollowBehaviour extends Object implements Behaviour
Behaviour class that simulates Actor moving towards another Actor, Item or Ground.

  • Constructor Details

    • FollowBehaviour

      public FollowBehaviour​(String description, int min_radius, int max_radius)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      description - purpose description of the motivation to perform following action
      min_radius - minimum number of squares from DinoActor too start searching for something to follow
      max_radius - maximum number of squares from DinoActor to search for something to follow

  • Method Details

    • motivatedToFollow

      abstract boolean motivatedToFollow​(DinoActor dinoActor)
      Returns true if the DinoActor has a reason / fulfills certain criteria to be able to follow something
      Parameters:
      dinoActor - DinoActor that is acting
      Returns:
      true if the DinoActor should attempt to follow, false otherwise.

    • findTarget

      abstract Location findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor actorAsDino)
      Checks whether the Location destination has a target that the DinoActor is trying to find and returns it if true, otherwise null is returned.
      Parameters:
      map - GameMap that the DinoActor is on
      destination - Location that is checked for target
      actorAsDino - DinoActor that is finding its target to follow
      Returns:
      a Location if the target is found on it, null otherwise.

    • getAction

      public Action getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Checks all locations that are within MIN_RADIUS and MAX_RADIUS away from the actor's location. If there is something that the actor wants to follow on a location, returns a MoveActorAction to that location immediately. If after searching through all locations within the range and no suitable target to follow is found, return null.
      Specified by:
      getAction in interface Behaviour
      Parameters:
      actor - the Actor acting
      map - the GameMap containing the Actor
      Returns:
      a MoveActorAction if the actor found a target to follow within range MIN_RADIUS and MAX_RADIUS squares away from Actor's location, null otherwise.
      See Also:
      Actor.playTurn(Actions, Action, GameMap, Display)

    • moveCloser

      private Action moveCloser​(Location actorLocation, Location destination, Actor actor)
      Returns the MoveActorAction that leads actor closer to target destination.
      Parameters:
      actorLocation - location of the actor
      destination - location of the destination that the actor wants to reach
      actor - actor that is trying to move closer to the target destination
      Returns:
      MoveActorAction if there is a way to get closer to the destination, null otherwise

    • getSpottedLocations

      private static List<Location> getSpottedLocations​(GameMap map, Location actorLocation, NumberRange numRange, int offset, boolean forHorizontal)
      Gets locations that are in one cardinal direction of the actor and is offset number of squares away from the actor's location.
      Parameters:
      map - GameMap that the Actor is currently on
      actorLocation - Current location of the Actor
      numRange - NumberRange object to iterate through to get Locations needed
      offset - distance that the locations to be returned should be from the actor's location
      forHorizontal - true if want to retrieve horizontal locations (along x-axis of North or South of actor's location), false if want to retrieve vertical locations (along y-axis of East or West of actor's location)
      Returns:
      A list of locations in one cardinal direction of the Actor that are offset number of squares away

    • lookAround

      private static List<Location> lookAround​(GameMap map, Actor actor, int radius)
      Get all locations from radius number of squares away from the Actor's location for all four cardinal directions.
      Parameters:
      map - GameMap that the Actor is currently on
      actor - Actor that is acting
      radius - The distance in number of squares away from the actor that needs to be returned.
      Returns:
      all locations from radius number of squares away from the Actor's location

    • distance

      private static int distance​(Location a, Location b)
      Compute the Manhattan distance between two locations.
      Parameters:
      a - the first location
      b - the first location
      Returns:
      the number of steps between a and b if you only move in the four cardinal directions.
